metadata.description: Daredevil leaves Hell's Kitchen for sunny San Francisco! Gifted with an imperceptible radar sense and a passion for justice, blind lawyer Matt Murdock--a.k.a. DAREDEVIL--protects the Golden City's streets from all manner of evil. But big changes are in store for Matt Murdock as old haunts and familiar faces rise to give the devil his due.
metadata.name: Daredevil
